messages.title: The world is getting more chaotic...
messages.content: Every day things seem to be getting more and more unpredictable. Universal Credit, the environmental crisis, Brexit, Britain collapsing our services and the rest. In such uncertain times we need a safe pair of hands. Alison McGovern lives in New Ferry, her office is based there and she has been there for us since 2010.

messages.title: ...but we know we can rely on Alison...
messages.content: Alison has a proven track record as the MP for Wirral South. From fighting to rebuild New Ferry, battling on behalf of individual constituents to get what they deserve, standing up to discrimination to working to save local jobs, we can rely on Alison.

messages.title: ...and only Alison can stop Boris in the Wirral.
messages.content: Only a vote for Alison will stop Boris winning in the Wirral South. A vote for the Lib Dems or the Greens here is a vote for Boris. So, if you don't want Boris to wreck the country, make sure you do your bit to stop him by voting Labour. #StickwithAlison.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I WILL CONTINUE TO FIGHT FOR NEW FERRY UNTIL WE HAVE REBUILT OUR TOWN
I WILL WORK TOGETHER WITH ALL SIDES TO PROTECT JOBS IN OUR FACTORIES AND CAR PLANTS
I WILL FIGHT THE TORY POLICIES THAT HAVE MADE LIFE WORSE IN THE WIRRAL
I WILL FIGHT FOR A GREEN FUTURE AND INVESTMENT IN CLIMATE CHANGE

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a vote for Alison will stop Boris winning in Wirral South. A vote for the Lib Dems or the Greens here is a vote for Boris.

issues.environment: environmental crisis, investment in climate change
issues.labourEmployment: working to save local jobs, PROTECT JOBS IN OUR FACTORIES AND CAR PLANTS

community.content: fighting to rebuild New Ferry, I WILL CONTINUE TO FIGHT FOR NEW FERRY UNTIL WE HAVE REBUILT OUR TOWN

leaflet.personalStatement: It has been an honour to be your MP and to represent the place where I was born and live. I love my home and will never stop fighting for the best for you, my friends and for my family too. The world is going through uncertain times and we need to stick together to make sure our children’s future is secure. I pledge that I will keep working to that goal. All the very best, Alison

endorsements.endorsement: I am really worried about the future of our country. I'm not sure I can trust what I see on the news or on the internet anymore. I need an MP I can trust and rely on, and that is Alison.

"Our children's future is at stake here. This is a time we really can rely on Alison. Alison has a strong track record fighting for us. I have my trust and my confidence in Alison. I hope everybody else does too."

examples: Every day things seem to be getting more and more unpredictable.
Alison has a proven track record as the MP for Wirral South.
It has been an honour to be your MP and to represent the place where I was born and live.
I love my home and will never stop fighting for the best for you, my friends and for my family too.
Alison McGovern lives in New Ferry, her office is based there and she has been there for us since 2010.
From fighting to rebuild New Ferry, battling on behalf of individual constituents to get what they deserve, standing up to discrimination to working to save local jobs, we can rely on Alison.
Only a vote for Alison will stop Boris winning in Wirral South.
So, if you don't want Boris to wreck the country, make sure you do your bit to stop him by voting Labour.
The world is going through uncertain times and we need to stick together to make sure our children’s future is secure.
